subject: Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Sports Injuries
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Saints will have to name an interim coach to replace Sean Payton, who was suspended for the 2012 season for his role in a bounty scandal.
snippet: The Saints will have to name an interim coach to replace Sean Payton, who was suspended for the 2012 season for his role in a bounty scandal.
